column4: Is there a way to set up raid / lvm partitions using the 9.04 graphical installer?
it only gives me choices for traditional filesystems as far as i can tell.
you could always set up the raid by hand, and then tell the installer to use those partions
yeah, but the gui is very very shiny.  Someone spent a lot of time making it look nice, I feel like I should use it.  :P
